• Class GestionnaireCSV

    This Class is used to create the *.csv File, this file contains kind a summary of all the Matrix comparison that have been displayed accroding to user's choices. The content is filled with the data downloaded from WikiData The Data represents each product, and it's features ...

        public void addDatas(java.lang.String data,
                     java.io.FileWriter fileWriter)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Function responsible for adding Data into the csv File, this function requires 2 parameters
        Parameters:
        data - Type String, stands for product's feature, which will be written in the csv file's content
        fileWriter - Type Filewriter, stands for the Csv file which is about to be filled with data
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When there is a problem in creating file, or openning it ...

      • addHeader

        public void addHeader(java.lang.String titreMatrice,
                      java.lang.String header,
                      java.lang.String data)
               throws java.io.IOException
        This function is responsible for creating the *.csv file, using 3 parameters :
        Parameters:
        titreMatrice - Type String, The title of generated CSV file
        header - Type String, The header of the content in the CSV file
        data - Type String, The data that contains information about the product's features
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When there is a problem in creating file, or openning it ...
